entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Stephen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Stephen 8:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: NE 24 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries becoming mixed with a few rain showers early in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
